effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.

effect.mega_dimension: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the user’s fire type after damage calculation. If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.
